name: Too Many Bunnies
description:
You must achieve the dream of every bunny farmer: the golden bunny. But make sure to keep an eye on your bunnies as they may get out of control!

Press E to pick up bunnies.

Press Esc to view pause Menu.

Press buttons to drop bunnies and right click to drop all.

Drop Bunnies in truck to sell.

Submission for GMTK game jam 2020
